title: Kaiba
synopsis: In a world where memories exist in memory chips separate from the body, death of the body no longer means death of the soul. It is possible for memories to be viewed, altered, and transferred between bodies. These memory chips are used by the rich to obtain eternal lives in carefully selected bodies, while for the poor, selling their own bodies and conserving their souls in the chips often become the only way to earn a living. An electrolytic cloud in the sky serves as a barrier between the heavens of the fortunate and the underworld of the destitute, making this social division impregnable.
voices: ['Kuwashima, Houko', 'Noto, Mamiko', 'Park, Romi', 'Saitou, Chiwa', 'Egawa, Hisao', 'Mizuta, Wasabi', 'Cho', 'Fujimura, Ayumi', 'Iwanaga, Tetsuya']
